Good for America`` I can appreciate the fact that Mike Pence 's unyielding right-wing voting record on literally every issue is appreciated by the far-right,'' The Washington Monthly's liberal Steve Benen says. But to say that the guy isn't ready for prime time is a dramatic understatement. Mike Pence has no areas of expertise, has no major pieces of legislation to his name, has demonstrated no working understanding of any area of public policy, and after spending five minutes watching him speak on any subject, it becomes clear that he's conspicuously unintelligent. Among the candidates Mike Pence helped was Jackie Walorski , a tea party favorite who narrowly lost her race against Democratic Rep. Joe Donnelly in northern Indiana. Jackie Walorski said Mike Pence can appeal to both social and economic conservatives. I know he feels pulled because there is a great campaign to recruit him at the federal level, she said.`` I'm going to be excited whatever door he picks.'' If Mike Pence does decide to run for president, he'll likely have to start working quickly to raise campaign money.
